summary:
Adds Smithing Potions and an OP enchantment.

To be used with Perkus Maximus
descriptionHtml:
Perkus Maximus removes any form of Smithing enhancers which made me sad, because I like to make OP weapons.

This small mod adds:

Amphoe's Ambrosia (Improve smithing 100%)
Amphoe's Potion (Improve smithing 50%)
Warrior - An enchantment that boosts One-Handed, Block, and Armor rating.
Ring of the Warrior - Ring with said enchantment. Use console to get the enchantment.

I was going to make a fortify smithing enchantment but decided not to because I was lazy.

DOES NOT REQUIRE ANY MOD AND SHOULD BE COMPATIBLE WITH EVERY MOD

Common sense for load order. Just let LOOT do it.

Â You should probably only use this if you want to boost your smithing and have PerMa, OR if you want my OP enchantment.
author: Amphoe
